name: Extreme Terrian Quadski Racing
description:
4x4 Bike Riding game where you get to shoot off hilltops while doing back-flips and somersaults in the air and not just that this Quadski can manage to sail on water.This adrenaline-pumping extreme sports game will bring you to the edge of your seat. Get lots of off-road fun by driving over some astounding bumps and ramps to beat the other guys.
Do you think you're up to the challenge?
Then Go for it Off-road Champ!
